data.benefits: Scheme provides assistance of Rs. 0.25 lakhs as a grant to the industries located in rural areas of Assam.
data.eligibility:
1. The industry should located in a rural areas of Assam. 
  2. This industry should be an existing one and having continuous operation for minimum of last two years. 
  3. The unit should have its own work shed for production and process. Age of the applicant should not be less than 18 years and more than maximum of 50 years. There is no bar of educational qualification.
data.conditions: The unit should have avail term loan/working capital loan to the extend to minimum of one lakh. The amount of grant shall be utilized by the units for procurement of machinery /raw materials, as the case may be.
data.beneficiaries:
1. The industry should located in a rural areas of Assam. 
  2. This industry should be an existing one and having continuous operation for minimum of last two years. 
  3. The unit should have its own work shed for production and process. Age of the applicant should not be less than 18 years and more than maximum of 50 years. There is no bar of educational qualification.
data.prerequisites: The unit should have avail term loan/working capital loan to the extend to minimum of one lakh. The amount of grant shall be utilized by the units for procurement of machinery /raw materials, as the case may be.
data.context: Boneej is a special scheme to assist the rural industries of the state and it was announced by the Honourable Finance Minister in his Budget speech on 26th July, 2016.
data.objective: To provide special grant for rural industrial enterprises in traditional and micro sector in Assam.
data.description: The assistance to provide Rs. 0.25 lakhs as a grant to the industries located in Rural areas only where the annual turnover is less than Rs. 5 lakh.
data.how_to_apply:
Application form can be submitted to concerned General Manager, District Industries and Commerce Center (DICC) as per application Form: A (available in schemes guideline), along with following required documents :-

  • One Pass Port size photograph
  • Copy of Industry registration
  • Caste Certificate, as applicable
  • Copy of proof of identity
  • Copy of proof of address
  • Training Certificate , if available
  • Copy of First page of Bank Pass Book
data.funding_mechanism: After the receipt of approval from District Level Committee, applicant have to submit the statement to Commissione rate of Industries and Commerce containing the name, quantum of assistance, Bank name, Account name, etc.
data.additional_info:
The scheme is not applicable to areas under: Karbi Anglong Autonomous District Council, 
NC Hills Autonomous District Council, Bodoland Territorial Autonomous Districts.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed copy of Form A - Application form* 
2. Copy of Industry registration (Udyam, etc) 
3. Copy of the Constitution of the Enterprise 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise & Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory (if applicable) 
5. One Pass Port size photograph 
6. Caste Certificate (as applicable) 
7. Training Certificate (if available) 
8. Copy of First page of Bank Passbook 
9. Quotation from the fair organization regarding rent to be submitted 
10. GST Registration (as applicable) 
11. Copy of Entrepreneurship Memorandum Certificate 
12. Other Relevant Documents (if required)
